title: Ontology-Based Language Learning Design Model Development Program

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Corporate In-Service Training Program to Strengthen Competencies in Designing Practically Applicable Learning Content

learning_goals: Learners will be able to systematically classify language learning content using an ontology-based design model.
Learners will be able to design interactive learning scenarios applying ontology structures in simulation/VR environments.
Learners will be able to develop three or more language learning modules implementable in constrained technological environments (smartphone-based).

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
